alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 1:12AM MDT until June 22 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Pinon affecting Pueblo County. Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek At Colorado Springs affecting El Paso County. .Heavy rainfall across southern El Paso county will cause flooding of Fountain Creek. Water levels have receded for Fountain Creek at Colorado Springs but flooding will continue downstream. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...Moderate to Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flood waters flow over Old Pueblo Road south of Fountain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.1 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Fountain Creek Fountain 12.0 11.2 Thu 12 am MD 8.9 8.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued early this morning at 215 AM MDT.
